posts.title: Breaking Bad - What if Hank never found out about Heisenberg
posts.description: I mean it could easily be done especially given the fact that Walt was perfectionist

posts.title: Breaking Bad - Why Mike didn't went with Gus on Hector
posts.description: After watching Better Call Saul, it seems like Mike was much more important to Gus than we thought in Breaking Bad, so this choice is out of my mind

posts.title: Is Breaking bad best show of all time
posts.description: Maybe Sopranos or BCS are close, but other than that I doubt that

discussion.comment: Because everyone makes a mistake, Heisenberg was big egoist so it was just matter of time before he made a mistake
